body:
# great_idea

An app for keeping track of great ideas!

### Setting up the project

1. [Install required dependencies, but skip Lucky CLI](https://luckyframework.org/guides/getting-started/installing#install-required-dependencies)
1. Install [Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/)
1. Start up docker compose `docker-compose up -d`
1. Create env file `echo 'DATABASE_URL="postgres://postgres:@localhost:5434/postgres"' > .env`
1. Install project dependencies `shards install`
1. Create lucky command `./script/create_lucky.sh`
1. Migrate database `bin/lucky db.migrate`
1. Create seeds `bin/lucky db.create_seeds`
1. Import Hasura metadata `bin/lucky hasura.import`
1. Start server `bin/lucky dev`
  - Lucky Server: `localhost:5000`
  - Hasura Console: `localhost:8081`
  - Postgres: `localhost:5434`

### Learning Lucky

This is a project written using [Lucky](https://luckyframework.org). Enjoy!

Lucky uses the [Crystal](https://crystal-lang.org) programming language. You can learn about Lucky from the [Lucky Guides](https://luckyframework.org/guides/getting-started/why-lucky).

def.name: preload_user
def.body:
add_preload do |records|
  ids = [] of User::PrimaryKeyType
  records.each do |record|
    record.user_id.try do |id|
      ids << id
    end
  end
  empty_results = {} of User::PrimaryKeyType => Array(User)
  user = ids.empty? ? empty_results : (preload_query.dup.id.in(ids)).results.group_by(&.id)
  records.each do |record|
    if (    id = record.user_id)
      record.__set_preloaded_user(user[id]?.try(&.first?))
    else
      record.__set_preloaded_user(nil)
    end
  end
end
self

def.name: preload_ideas
def.body:
add_preload do |records|
  ids = records.map(&.id)
  if ids.empty?
    ideas = {} of Idea::PrimaryKeyType => Array(Idea)
  else
    ideas = (preload_query.dup.user_id.in(ids)).results.group_by(&.user_id)
  end
  records.each do |record|
    record._preloaded_ideas=(ideas[record.id]? || ([] of Idea))
  end
end
self

def.name: permitted_params
def.body:
new_params = {} of String => String
(@params.nested(self.class.param_key)).each do |key, value|
  new_params[key] = value
end
new_params.select(@@permitted_param_keys)

def.name: set_created_at_from_param
def.body:
parse_result = Time::Lucky.parse(_value)
if parse_result.is_a?(Avram::Type::SuccessfulCast)
  created_at.value = parse_result.value.as(Time)
else
  created_at.add_error("is invalid")
end

types.doc: Generates and decodes JSON Web Tokens for Authenticating users.
types.summary: Generates and decodes JSON Web Tokens for Authenticating users.

def.name: decode_user_id
def.body:
begin
  payload, _ = JWT.decode(token, Lucky::Server.settings.secret_key_base, ALGORITHM)
  payload["sub"].to_s.to_i64
rescue e : JWT::Error
  Lucky.logger.error(jwt_decode_error: e.message)
  nil
end
